name: Garlic Croutons With Parmesan Cheese
keywords: french bread, garlic, parmesan, side dish
recipeIngredient: Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Rub the crust of the French bread with the garlic cloves. Cut the bread into slices 1/2-inch thick, then brush one side with the olive oil.
Grind some black pepper over the bread and sprinkle each slice with Parmesan cheese.
Place the bread slices on a baking sheet in the oven. Bake until they are golden brown, about 10 minutes or less. After ladling the soup into bowls, top each serving with slices of bread.
